CustomField.description: This is the same as the User lookup for person submitting expense, but uses the Contact object in case it must be a person who is not licensed to use Leankor but must be put in the database.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: You can optionally select a Contact for the person submitting the expense if they are not a Leankor or Salesforce user.
CustomField.label: Contact Submitting (Optional)
